name: Ducktective
description:
A crime has been committed... The only one who's tough enough to investigate is... Ducktective!

This is a very short adventure/"investigation" game with an unusual control scheme!
Last week I said I was going to spend less than 2 hours on games for this jam, but I was wrong! I spent so much on this one! Hahaha!

HUGE thanks to Benjamin Michenaud for the sound design and Jonathan Bretheau for the music!

Note: Google chrome may not work. Please use another web browser if the screen is all black!
